content: gorgeous and warm scarf/shawl 1 crocheted in the beautiful lollipop 2 yarn the yarn 3 is made of 20% wool and 80% acrylic and is available in many beautiful colour combinations lollipop 4 is perfect for this project and the colours give this otherwise quite simple pattern a completely different look and a beautiful play of colours choose your favorite lollipop 5 and put some colour into winter enjoy **materials ** - crochet hook h - 5mm if you crochet tight you can use size i - 5 5mm - hobbii lollipop 6 **measurements ** approx 70 x 30 in the size can vary by making more or fewer row **uses ** approx 375 g 13 2 oz or just under 2 balls of hobbii lollipop 7 **abbreviations ** **chain** chain **st** stitch **single_crochet** single_crochet **double_crochet** double_crochet **treble_crochet** triple crochet 1 https //hobbii com/lollipop-scarf-shawl utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=pattern&utm_content=lollipop-scarf-shawl&utm_term=swr 2 https //hobbii com/lollipop utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=lollipop&utm_term=swr 3 https //hobbii com/lollipop utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=lollipop&utm_term=swr 4 https //hobbii com/lollipop utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=lollipop&utm_term=swr 5 https //hobbii com/lollipop utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=lollipop&utm_term=swr 6 https //hobbii com/lollipop utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=lollipop&utm_term=swr 7 https //hobbii com/lollipop utm_medium=social&utm_source=ravelry&utm_campaign=product&utm_content=lollipop&utm_term=swr
